note.p: Austro-Hungarian-born colonial medical officer. Born in Freystadt in Silesia (now Kożuchów in Poland). Medical officer on the voyage of the Circe, 1849–50. Health officer in the Royal Dutch East Indian Army, 1852–66. Practised medicine privately in Surabaya, Java, 1866–77.
Index biographicus, Institute for the History of Science, University of Utrecht, Netherlands
Java-bode: nieuws, handels- en advertentieblad voor Nederlandsch-Indie, 12 September 1893, p. [2]
Natuurkundig Tijdschrift voor Nederlandsch-Indië, Register of the public servants of the department of colonies (Netherlands) 910: 103
